price: 29. Or, vous ne voudrez rien qu’Allah ne veuille, Lui, le Seigneur de l’Univers.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
